title: Retina screen 2014 or 2015
message: I just got a retina A1502 screen but seller is not sure if it is 2014 or 2015. Is there any way to check that?

title: Retina screen 2014 or 2015
message: remove the hinges cover and check the panel number....

title: Retina screen 2014 or 2015
message: Plug it in and see if it works, no harm is done if it is the wrong type.
